modName: Sons of Skyrim 8-Bit Main Menu Theme
summary:
This is the main menu theme of Skyrim converted to 8-Bit.

I converted it myself, so it may sound a little different than some of the others on Nexus.
descriptionHtml:
This is the main menu theme of Skyrim converted to 8-Bit.

I converted it myself, so it may sound a little different than some of the others on Nexus.

Install with NMM, or manually drop the Data folder into your Skyrim Directory, overwriting if necessary.

Video of what it sounds like:

[youtube]VvTcPx8euCI[/youtube]

All credits go to Bethesda and Jeremy Soule for providing this amazing game and amazing soundtrack!
author: ChrisDovahkiin
